page.title: 16TRAFFIC IN BOTLEY.
page.content: One of the main problems with Botley is the traffic.Lots of lorries go through Botley and it gets congested very quickly.It is very difficult for people to cross the roads in Botley because there are cars parked in every parking space.People in Botley would like a zebra crossing but the council will only put in a crossing from pavement to pavement.Unfortunately the look of the square would be spoilt if pavements were added to it. People in Botley were at first against the Farm museum being sited there because of the extra traffic this would bring to the village.Cars were however routed through Hamble Country Park and opinions have changed so that there is now a society of friends of the museum in Botley.
